org.matrix.androidsdk.sync

Class EventsThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.sync.EventsThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class EventsThread
extends Thread
    Thread that continually watches the event stream and sends events to its listener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EventsThread.SyncDelayReceiver
      Use a broadcast receiver because the Timer delay might be inaccurate when the screen is turned off.

      • setNetworkConnectivityReceiver

        public void setNetworkConnectivityReceiver(NetworkConnectivityReceiver networkConnectivityReceiver)
        Set the network connectivity listener. It is used to avoid restarting the events threads each 10 seconds when there is no available network.
        Parameters:
        networkConnectivityReceiver - the network receiver

      • setFailureCallback

        public void setFailureCallback(ApiFailureCallback failureCallback)
        Set the failure callback.
        Parameters:
        failureCallback - the failure callback.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause the thread. It will resume where it left off when unpause()d.

      • unpause

        public void unpause()
        Unpause the thread if it had previously been paused. If not, this does nothing.

      • catchup

        public void catchup()
        Catchup until some events are retrieved.
